definitions.title: n.m. pestilence
definitions.body: (cf. Ar. dabrun, 0’idba0run, departure, death)—Ex 9:3 + ; [[דָָּבֶר]] Hb Hab 3:5; sf. [[דְּבָרֶיךָ]] Ho 13:14; —

plague, pestilence, in general Ex 5:3, Ex 9:15, Nu 14:12 (J) Le 26:25 (H) De 28:21, 2Sa 24:13, 2Sa 24:15 (+ v:2Sa 24:15 a LXX We Dr) = 1Ch 21:12, 1Ch 21:14, 1Ki 8:37 = 2Ch 6:28, 2Ch 7:13, 2Ch 20:9, Ps 91:3, Ps 91:6, Je 14:12 + 16 t. Je, Ez Eze 5:12 + 11 t. Ez, Ho 13:14, Am 4:10, Hb Hab 3:5. Rd. [[וּבַדָָּבֶר]], or the like, 1Sa 4:8, for MT [[בַּמִּדְבָּר]], We Klo Dr. †
